languages.text: Gives an additional turn to a Cybermastiff. During this turn it deals increased damage.

traits.locale_text: Gives an additional turn to a Cybermastiff. During this turn it deals increased damage.

languages.text: The Leashmaster grants an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} to the cyber-mastiff. During that turn, the cyber-mastiff deals increased {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.
languages.original_text: Арбитр-псарь предоставляет кибермастифу {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}дополнительный ход{/g}, во время которого кибермастиф наносит увеличенный {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g}.

traits.locale_text: The Leashmaster grants an extra turn to the cyber-mastiff. During that turn, the cyber-mastiff deals increased damage.

The Leashmaster grants an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} to the cyber-mastiff. During that {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the cyber-mastiff deals increased {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

The Leashmaster grants an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} to the cyber-mastiff. During that {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the cyber-mastiff deals increased {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

languages.text: Арбитр-псарь предоставляет кибермастифу {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}дополнительный ход{/g}, во время которого кибермастиф наносит увеличенный {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g}.
languages.original_text: The Leashmaster grants an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} to the cyber-mastiff. During that turn, the cyber-mastiff deals increased {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

languages.text: Tasmacı, siber mastife bir {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}ek tur{/g} kazandırır. Siber mastif, bu tur sırasında artırılmış {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasar{/g} verir.
languages.original_text: The Leashmaster grants an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} to the cyber-mastiff. During that turn, the cyber-mastiff deals increased {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Tasmacı, siber mastife bir {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}ek tur{/g} kazandırır. Siber mastif, bu {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tur{/g} sırasında artırılmış {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasar{/g} verir.

languages.text: El amo adiestrador otorga un {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}turno extra{/g} al cibermastín. Durante ese turno, el cibermastín inflige {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} adicional.
languages.original_text: The Leashmaster grants an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} to the cyber-mastiff. During that turn, the cyber-mastiff deals increased {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

traits.locale_text: El amo adiestrador otorga un {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}turno extra{/g} al cibermastín. Durante ese {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}, el cibermastín inflige {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} adicional.

languages.text: 训犬师赋予目标生化獒犬一个{g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}额外回合{/g}。在额外回合期间，生化獒犬可造成更高{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}。
languages.original_text: The Leashmaster grants an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} to the cyber-mastiff. During that turn, the cyber-mastiff deals increased {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 训犬师赋予目标生化獒犬一个{g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}额外回合{/g}。在额外{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}期间，生化獒犬可造成更高{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}。

languages.text: Le maître-mastiff octroie au cyber-mastiff un {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}tour supplémentaire{/g} pendant lequel il inflige des {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} supplémentaires.
languages.original_text: The Leashmaster grants an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} to the cyber-mastiff. During that turn, the cyber-mastiff deals increased {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Le maître-mastiff octroie au cyber-mastiff un {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}tour supplémentaire{/g} pendant lequel il inflige des {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} supplémentaires.

languages.text: リーシュマスターは、サイバーマスチフに{g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}追加のターン{/g}を与える。その{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}の間、サイバーマスチフの{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}与えるダメージ{/g}が増加する。
languages.original_text: The Leashmaster grants an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} to the cyber-mastiff. During that {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the cyber-mastiff deals increased {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

traits.locale_text: リーシュマスターは、サイバーマスチフに{g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}追加のターン{/g}を与える。その{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}の間、サイバーマスチフの{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}与えるダメージ{/g}が増加する。

languages.text: Der Leinenmeister gewährt dem Cyber-Mastiff einen {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}Zusatzzug{/g}. Während dieses Zuges verursacht der Cyber-Mastiff höheren {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Der Leinenmeister gewährt dem Cyber-Mastiff einen {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}Zusatzzug{/g}. Während dieses {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zuges{/g} verursacht der Cyber-Mastiff höheren {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g}.
